title: Langu Langu Lyrics Saravanan Irukka Bayamaen
stanzas:
<div>
<div>
Langu Langu Lyrics Saravanan Irukka Bayamaen

langu langu labakkaru
oturaanga scooter-u.
dingu dingu dimikkaru
suththi paaru tractor-u

muttiyila soru pongi
moodi vachcha korangu nee
muttaatha enna vandhu
mookkaruppen odhungu nee

vattiyila soru ponga
vakkillaatha amukka nee
vetti kadha pesaiyila
soriya vaikkum serangu nee

kattaiyila unna thaechi
aakkiduven chappaathi.
ennaiyila unna veesi
porichiduven rasaathi.

langu langu labakkaru
oturaanga scooter-u.
dingu dingu dimikkaru
suththi paaru tractor-u(2)

kozhi mutta kannu
adhu kannu illa bannu
omeletta pottu
unna pogaporen thinnu

ippo edhukku poti
nee panna venaam lootti
yegathukku aadinaale
aava neeyum raatti.

vitturu vitturu thimira
nee velanji thongura avarai.
aanaji unna kuzhambu vachchaa
mudiyumaa nee nimura.

aalu valarndha pakki
un arivu pochu makki.
kizhinju pona touserula
kaanaa pochu kokki.

langu langu labakkaru
oturaanga scooter-u.
dingu dingu dimikkaru
suththi paaru tractor-u(2)

muttiyila soru pongi
moodi vachcha korangu nee
muttaatha enna vandhu
mookkaruppen odhungu nee

vattiyila soru ponga
vakkillaatha amukka nee
vetti kadha pesaiyila
soriya vaikkum serangu nee

kattaiyila unna thaechi
aakkiduven chappaathi.
ennaiyila unna veesi
porichiduven rasaathi.

langu langu labakkaru
oturaanga scooter-u.
dingu dingu dimikkaru
suththi paaru tractor-u(2)
